I think we're missing each other on this conversation. First=

t is and what to do with it. As a client consuming my service API they *sho=
uld* know that what ever way I return the various links that they can make =

</links>


Is that wrong? That would allow a client,=
 as well as a bot to be able to determine what it can do with each resource=
 link.

@POST

public Response create(..){
=
